bill_title: revise certain provisions relating to submission of budget requests and budget reports to the Legislative Research Council and the Legislature.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions relating to submission of budget requests and budget reports to the Legislative Research Council and the Legislature. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 4-7-7 be amended to read as follows: 4-7-7. The head of each budget unit, not later than October fifteenth of each year, shall submit, on forms prescribed by the Bureau of Finance and Management and in the manner deemed appropriate, such explanatory data as required and necessary to adequately convey the budget requests , for the next fiscal year to the Bureau of Finance and Management estimates of the financial requirements of his budget unit for the next fiscal year and the Legislative Research Council . The estimates so submitted shall first receive the approval of the board or commission of each budget unit for which a board or commission is constituted. Not later than the November first following such submission, copies of such explanatory data of the budget requests shall be transmitted to the Legislative Research Council by the Bureau of Finance and Management. The head of each budget unit shall submit the budget request to the Legislative Research Council on the same day that it is delivered to the Bureau of Finance and Management. Section 2. That § 4-7-7.1 be amended to read as follows: 4-7-7.1. All budget units , not later than October fifteenth of each year, shall submit to the Bureau of Finance and Management and the Legislative Research Council with their budget request a detailed plan of their goals and program activities. All budget units shall submit the detailed plan of their goals and program activities to the Legislative Research Council on the same day that it is delivered to the Bureau of Finance and Management. Section 3. That § 4-7-12 be amended to read as follows: 4-7-12. The Governor-elect and his designated budget representatives shall be entitled to examine the budget report in process , and the Bureau of Finance and Management shall provide him the Governor-elect with every practicable facility for familiarizing himself becoming familiar with its contents. In case of a change of administration, the outgoing Governor shall deliver the budget report to the Legislature with his message, and the incoming Governor shall then have ten legislative days in which to review the budget as prepared and delivered by his predecessor, and he may send to the Legislature a supplementary budget message making suggestions for any changes which he deems wise Governor-elect shall provide a budget report to the Legislature in accordance with this chapter .
